options.name: Oral Tradition
options.description: You have memorized countless stories and songs. Gain +1 skill with expression. You can recall historical events, legends, and cultural tales with perfect accuracy.

options.name: Action : Battle Hymn
options.description: Begin singing an inspiring battle song. While you maintain this song (requires concentration), allies within 15 units gain +1 die on their next attack roll each round.

options.name: Reaction : Mocking Verse
options.description: When an enemy misses an attack, mock them with a cutting verse. They must make a resilience check (DC 8) or suffer -1 die on social defense rolls for the next minute.

options.name: Thunderous Voice
options.description: Your trained voice carries great power. Gain +1 skill with endurance. Your voice can be heard up to 100 units away. You can use expression to make sonic attacks dealing 2 psychic damage to all enemies within 5 units (once per combat).

options.name: Saga Keeper
options.description: You preserve the deeds of heroes in song. Gain +1 skill with academics and learn one ancient language. When you witness an ally perform a great deed, compose a saga during rest. They gain +1 resolve and advantage on social checks where your saga has spread.

options.name: Instruments of War
options.description: Your instruments serve as weapons. Gain +1 skill with coordination. Your musical instruments can be used as weapons (1d6 physical damage) and you can maintain performances while fighting.

options.name: Action : Song of Valor
options.description: Sing an epic tale of heroism. All allies within 20 units gain +5 temporary health and immunity to fear effects for the next minute. Once the song ends, they gain +1 die on their next attack.

options.name: Loremaster
options.description: Your stories carry supernatural power. Gain +1 skill with presence. Once per day, tell a story that becomes temporarily true - describe a minor historical event involving the current location (GM discretion).

options.name: Echo of Glory
options.description: You amplify the glory of victory. Gain +1 skill with resilience. When an ally within 30 units defeats an enemy, you can immediately perform a victory chant. All other allies gain +1 resolve and +1 energy.

options.name: Legendary Performance
options.description: Your performances achieve legendary status. Gain +1 skill with expression and +1 skill with presence. Once per day, perform a saga with one effect: all allies gain +2 dice on all checks for 3 rounds; OR all enemies must make resilience check (DC 12) or flee for 1 minute; OR one ally recovers all health, energy, and resolve.
